entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
